hero.description: Nurturing your child's growth from infancy to early childhood.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Little Great Minds is dedicated to providing a safe, nurturing, and stimulating environment for children aged 0 to 3 years. Our experienced educators focus on each child's individual needs, fostering creativity, curiosity, and foundational skills that prepare them for a bright future.

infantCare.title: Infant Care (0-1 years)
infantCare.description: Providing a loving and secure environment for your little ones.
infantCare.details: Our Infant Care program is designed to provide a safe and nurturing space for your baby’s earliest developmental stages. With a low caregiver-to-infant ratio, we ensure personalized attention and care. Our curriculum includes sensory play, gentle music, and activities that promote motor skills and emotional bonding. We also provide daily updates to keep you informed about your baby’s progress and milestones.
infantCare.keyFocus: Building trust, sensory stimulation, and early motor skills.

toddlerProgram.title: Toddler Program (1-2 years)
toddlerProgram.description: Encouraging exploration and developing essential motor skills.
toddlerProgram.details: Our Toddler Program focuses on fostering curiosity and independence in your growing child. Through structured play, creative activities, and outdoor exploration, we help toddlers develop their motor skills, language abilities, and social interactions. Our experienced educators create a fun and engaging environment where your child can thrive and build confidence.
activities: Creative play with shapes and colors
toddlerProgram.keyFocus: Promoting curiosity, coordination, and social engagement.

preschool.title: Preschool (2-3 years)
preschool.description: Fostering a solid foundation for academic and social success.
preschool.details: Our Preschool program prepares your child for the next steps in their educational journey. Through a blend of structured learning and creative play, we focus on early literacy, numeracy, and problem-solving skills. Our curriculum includes storytelling, group discussions, and hands-on activities that encourage teamwork and critical thinking. We also emphasize social-emotional development to help your child build strong relationships and self-confidence.
preschool.keyFocus: Encouraging early literacy, teamwork, and problem-solving skills.
